```{r}
#| echo: false
#| output: false

source(here::here("src", "init.R"), echo = FALSE)
```

❖ **Data**

```{r}
#| echo: false

responses <- c("Grip_Strength")
predictors <- c("Condition")

data <- load_behavior_teens()

data_agg <- (data 
  |> group_by(Mouse, Condition) 
  |> summarize(across(responses, .fns = \(.x) mean(.x, na.rm = T))) 
  |> ungroup() 
  |> mutate(dCondition = as.numeric(Condition == "IH")) 
  |> rowid_to_column("ID")
)

Grip_Strength_name <- "Grip Strength *(g)*"

contrasts(data$Condition) <- contr.treatment

data
```

## Grip Strength

```{r}
#| echo: false

## WARN: Always put the chosen model in first position
models <- list(
  glmmTMB(Grip_Strength ~ Condition + (1 | Mouse), family = Gamma("log"), data = data, REML = TRUE), 
  glmmTMB(Grip_Strength ~ Condition + (1 | Mouse), family = gaussian("log"), data = data, REML = TRUE)
)
```
